sentences.en: A dozen people were watching her, smirking at her discomfort.
sentences.cn: 有十来个人在看着她，对她不安的样子幸灾乐祸地笑着。

sentences.en: Aromatic capsules are great for easing the discomfort of a stuffy nose.
sentences.cn: 芳香胶囊对缓解鼻塞有奇效。
尴尬的问题会使人感到不安.

sentences.en: Happily, there was no apparent discomfort to any of the animals, although therewere some changes in pigmentation and superficial damage to the skin.
sentences.cn: 令人高兴的是，虽然有某些色素沉着的改变和皮肤表面的损伤，这些动物没有出现明显的不适。

sentences.en: He sings with the strained discomfort of someone whose voice hasn't quite broken.
sentences.cn: 他唱得很拘谨，声音听起来像是某个还没完全变声的男孩。

sentences.en: He sniffed, fidgeting in discomfort, uneasy at the suggestion.
sentences.cn: 他吸了吸鼻子，对这项提议感到窘迫不安，心烦意乱。

sentences.en: I was in considerable discomfort from the headache.
One has to bear a little discomfort while travelling.
sentences.cn: 旅行中总要忍受一点不便.

sentences.en: Roberts attempted to make light of his discomfort.
sentences.cn: 罗伯茨试图轻描淡写自己的不适。

sentences.en: She carried her left arm at an awkward angle, as if it were causing her discomfort.
sentences.cn: 她的左胳膊很不自然地抬着，好像它让她不舒服似的。

sentences.en: She hears the discomfort in his voice.
sentences.cn: 她听出了他声音中的窘迫。

sentences.en: She turned red with discomfort when the teacher spoke.
sentences.cn: 老师讲话时她不好意思地红着脸.

sentences.en: Some people use marijuana to fight pain or discomfort caused by disease.
sentences.cn: 有些人使用大麻来对抗疾病引起的疼痛或不适。

sentences.en: Stiffness and discomfort can usually be eased with heat or a warm bath.
sentences.cn: 肌肉酸痛和身体不适通常可以通过热敷或洗热水澡得到缓解。

sentences.en: The journey was accomplished with a maximum of comfort and ease and a minimum of discomfort.
sentences.cn: 带着最大限度的舒适和轻松结束了这一旅程,很少有什么不舒适.

sentences.en: The others seemed to find my discomfort hugely entertaining.
sentences.cn: 我觉得很尴尬,其他人却似乎觉得这非常有趣.

sentences.en: You will experience some minor discomfort during the treatment.

trans.tran_cn: 不舒适，不舒服，不安，不方便，苦恼
trans.tran_en: a feeling of slight pain or of being physically uncomfortable

trans.tran_cn: 使…不舒服，使…不安，使苦恼，使不便
